General.Name: Beijing InHand Networks Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing InHand Networks Technology Co., Ltd. provides industrial Internet of things (IoT) systems and solutions. The company provides IoT software and services, edge and cellular routers, IoT edge gateway, vehicle networking, cellular modems, embedded box PC, and industrial switches. It offers IoT solutions for smart grid, industrial automation, business internet, transportation, healthcare, retail, smart, smart city, and energy sectors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.
